question_and_options:
The question and options from the image are:

* How did we infer that the game being reviewed in the previous example was in general "well-liked"?
* Because the median score was 85 suggesting that most scores lean towards the higher end.
* Because The box plot was very wide.
* Because the Q3 was very high and this meant the scores were clustered together.
* Because the maximum value of the dataset was 95.
answer: because the median score was 85 suggesting that most scores lean towards the higher end.
